attributes.action: force Andrew Stephen Lindsay to stop shaving and grow a beard.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It will improve the environment, the standard of living across Newcastle and the UK (and possibly the world), and decrease the amount of ginger hair that clogs up our sewerage systems.
Once the beard is long enough, we also petition the Prime Minister to plait it.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
